title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters dreams to steal secrets and gets one final chance at redemption through an impossible inception mission.

title: Interstellar
description: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity as Earth becomes uninhabitable.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against intelligent machines.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who pushes Gotham into chaos.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist is recruited to communicate with mysterious aliens before global conflict erupts.

title: Avatar
description: A former marine on Pandora must choose between military orders and protecting an alien world.

title: The Prestige
description: Two rival magicians obsess over creating the ultimate illusion, leading to dangerous consequences.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner discovers a secret that leads him to track down Rick Deckard.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A band of unlikely heroes must protect a powerful orb from a fanatical warlord.

title: Shutter Island
description: A U.S. Marshal investigates a psychiatric facility where nothing is as it seems.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max allies with Furiosa in a high-octane escape.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over decades, finding solace and hope through acts of decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of hitmen, a boxer, and criminals intertwine in a stylish crime narrative.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch transfers control of his crime empire to his reluctant son.

title: Whiplash
description: An ambitious drummer pushes himself under a ruthless instructor at a music conservatory.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit begins a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: The Social Network
description: The rise of Facebook sparks ambition, lawsuits, and fractured friendships.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household with shocking consequences.

title: Dune
description: A gifted young heir must survive political betrayal and a desert planet's deadly challenges.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and teams with heroes from multiple dimensions.
